duties_responsibilities.duty: Process Returned for Collection activities and update club information as required.
Review daily activity files and make necessary adjustments to meet criteria.
Communicate with clubs, management, and internal account executives to provide reports.
Maintain general relationships with agencies and respond to questions and concerns.
Draft written replies as advised by the legal team and retain accurate records of online member complaints and responses.
Handle escalations to the COO for issues involving legal documents and ensure compliance with security policies.
Provide general client support and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; Bachelor's degree preferred
